attributes.action: hold a public referendum on the reintroduction of capital punishment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current legislation on the possession of guns and knives is obviously not a sufficient deterrent to prevent the escalation of murders on Britain's streets. Therefore we petition the Prime Minister to allow a public referendum on the reintroduction of capital punishment.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "hold a public referendum on the reintroduction of capital punishment."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17445
